## Installation 

To use the `sendis` package you will need a working version of the [R software](https://www.r-project.org/). 

```{r, installation, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
# First time installation in the R console : 
# Download and load the devtools package
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# Install and load the development version from GitHub:
devtools::install_github("fmichelsendis/sendis")
library(sendis)
```
